original: Zeilon, Per Erik, läroverksadjunkt, Göteborg, f. 21/3/85 i Arboga av rekto^ Jakob Persson o. Emmy Zeilon. G. 32 m. Brita Hejdeman. — Mog:ex. v, norra latin i Sthlm 04, fil. kand. i Upps. 08, provår v. Gbgs h. real 12. Vik. adj. i Skara 09-11, vik. lektor v. Gbgs h. real vt. 13, e. lär. där 13-19, adj. i Östersund 18-36, vik. lektor där ht 33-vt 36, adj. i eng. o. franska v. Vasa h. a. 1. i Gbg sed. 36. Res. t. Tyskl., Ital., Schweiz o. Frankr. Övers. Infernosångerna I-XIX ur Dantes La Divina Commedia (23-32).
translated: Zeilon, Per Erik, high school teacher, Gothenburg, b. 21/3/85 in Arboga, son of principal Jakob Persson and Emmy Zeilon. Married in 1932 to Brita Hejdeman. - Graduated from North Latin School in Stockholm in 1904, Bachelor of Arts from Uppsala University in 1908, probationary year at Gothenburg's Royal High School in 1912. Temporary teacher in Skara from 1909 to 1911, temporary lecturer at Gothenburg's Royal High School in spring 1913, regular teacher there from 1913 to 1919, high school teacher in Östersund from 1918 to 1936, temporary lecturer there from autumn 1933 to spring 1936, English and French teacher at Vasa High School in Gothenburg since 1936. Traveled to Germany, Italy, Switzerland, and France. Translated Inferno Songs I-XIX from Dante's La Divina Commedia (1923-1932).
